Collection.DataSetId: MOPITT Derived CO (Thermal Infrared Radiances) V006
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical Quantities at the sensor resolution or geolocated
Collection.VersionDescription: TIR-based CO retrievals based on corrected geolocation values, MERRA meteorological fields, and updated a priori

Address.StreetAddress: National Center for Atmospheric Research, 1850 Table Mesa Drive
NASA Langley Research Center, Mail Stop 157D

Platform.LongName: First EOS Polar Orbiting Satellite, 10:30 AM Descending Equator Crossing

Instrument.LongName: Measurements of Pollution In The Troposphere

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPFGRad5DiffThr
AdditionalAttribute.Description: First Guess minus Thermal 800mb A channel difference threshold

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPRad5FGRatioThr
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Ratio Thermal 800mb A channel to First Guess threshold

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPRad5FGRatioThr2
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Ratio Thermal 800mb A channel to First Guess Polar threshold

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPRad5FGRatioThrN
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Ratio Thermal 800mb A channel to First Guess night threshold

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPRad6FGDiffThr
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Absolute value of Solar 800mb A channel minus First Guess difference threshold

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPRad6FGRatioThr
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Ratio Solar 800mb A channel to First Guess threshold

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPCldTopPrDiff
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Surface Pressure minus Cloud Top Pressure difference threshold

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPNStarD
AdditionalAttribute.Description: N* cloud clearing technique Day limit

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPNStarN
AdditionalAttribute.Description: N* cloud clearing technique Night limit

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPOvrcstUniformity
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Overcast Cloud Top threshold determined by statistical uniformity of adjacent pixels

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPOvrcstOpacity
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Overcast Cloud Top threshold determined by the opacity of the clouds

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPPercentCloudCleared
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels which were cleared of clouds

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPConvIterAvg
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The average number of iterations required to converge on a retrieval

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPConvIterMax
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Maximum number of iterations permitted to occur before declaring the pixel as non-convergent

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPUncertCOSfc
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The average retrieved uncertainty of the surface CO mixing ratio

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPMaxCO
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The maximum observed total column CO value

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPMinCO
AdditionalAttribute.Description: The minimum observed total column CO value

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPMinCOMixRatSfc
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Minimum surface mixing ratio of CO

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPMaxCOMixRatSfc
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Maximum surface mixing ratio of CO

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPMinCOMixRat850
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Minimum mixing ratio of CO at 850 mb

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPMaxCOMixRat850
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Maximum mixing ratio of CO at 850 mb

AdditionalAttribute.Description: Minimum mixing ratio of CO at 700 mb

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPMaxCOMixRat700
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Maximum mixing ratio of CO at 700 mb

AdditionalAttribute.Name: MOPMaxCOMixRat500
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Maximum mixing ratio of CO at 500 mb

AdditionalAttribute.Description: Minimum mixing ratio of CO at 350 mb
